monday.name: Foundation Hinge
monday.warmup: 10 min BikeErg easy, 10 KB halos each direction, 10 goblet squats, 10 KB deadlifts light
strength: C2. KB Suitcase Carry: 3x40m each hand @ 53lb
monday.finisher: 3 RFT: 15 cal bike, 12 KB swings @ 44lb, 9 box jumps

tuesday.name: Grinder
tuesday.warmup: 500m row easy, 2 rounds: 10 KB swings, 10 push-ups, 10 air squats
tuesday.wod:
AMRAP 20 min:
5 KB thrusters @ 35lb
10 KB swings @ 53lb
15 box jumps (step down)
200m row

wednesday.name: Push-Pull Power
wednesday.warmup: 10 min BikeErg, arm circles, band pull-aparts if available, 10 push-ups
strength: A. KB Floor Press: 4x8 each arm @ 44lb
B1. KB Bent Over Row: 4x10 each @ 53lb
wednesday.finisher:
EMOM 10:
Odd: 10 cal row (sprint)
Even: 10 KB snatches (5 each) @ 35lb

thursday.name: Aerobic Builder
thursday.main:
BikeErg: 45 min @ 2:00-2:10 pace (conversational, HR 130-150)
Every 10 min, get off and do:
- 10 KB goblet squats @ 35lb
- 10 KB swings @ 44lb
- 10 push-ups
thursday.flow:
KB Flow x3 rounds (no rest):
5 deadlifts, 5 cleans, 5 front squats, 5 push press, 5 bent over rows
@ 35lb, smooth and controlled
thursday.cooldown: 10 min easy bike, full body stretch

friday.name: Erg Burner
friday.warmup: 1000m row building, 10 KB swings, 10 goblet squats
friday.wod:
5 Rounds for time:
250m row (SPRINT - aim sub 0:50)
10 KB snatches @ 35lb (5 each)
10 push-ups
10 box jumps
Rest 1:1 (if round takes 2 min, rest 2 min)

monday.name: Heavy Hinge
monday.warmup: 10 min BikeErg, 10 KB halos, 10 goblet squats, 10 single-leg glute bridges each
monday.finisher:
Tabata (8 rounds: 20s on, 10s off):
Alternate: Calorie Bike / KB Swings @ 44lb

tuesday.name: Chipper
tuesday.warmup: 400m row, 2 rounds: 8 KB deadlifts, 8 push-ups, 8 air squats
tuesday.wod:
For Time:
50 cal bike
40 KB swings @ 53lb
30 box jumps
20 KB thrusters @ 35lb
10 burpees
20 KB thrusters
30 box jumps
40 KB swings
50 cal bike

wednesday.name: Upper Volume
wednesday.warmup: 10 min BikeErg, shoulder circles, 10 push-ups, 10 KB halos
strength: B1. KB Gorilla Row: 4x12 total @ 53lb each hand
wednesday.finisher:
3 RFT:
12 cal row
12 KB push press @ 35lb (6 each)
12 renegade rows @ 35lb

thursday.name: Long Steady
thursday.main:
BikeErg: 50 min @ 2:00-2:10 pace
Every 12 min:
- 15 KB swings @ 44lb
- 10 goblet squats @ 35lb
- 5 burpees
thursday.flow:
KB Complex x4 rounds:
3 cleans + 3 front squats + 3 push press + 3 bent over rows
Each arm, no putting KB down
@ 35lb

friday.name: Sprint City
friday.wod:
10 Rounds:
100m row ALL OUT
10 KB swings @ 53lb
Rest 45 sec

Then:
3 min max cal bike

monday.name: Strength Endurance
monday.warmup: 10 min BikeErg, 10 KB halos, 10 goblet squats, 20 glute bridges
strength: B. KB Swing EMOM 10: 15 swings @ 53lb each minute
C1. Walking Lunge with KB: 3x12 each @ 35lb
monday.finisher:
AMRAP 8:
8 cal bike
8 goblet squats @ 44lb
8 box jumps

tuesday.name: The Classic
tuesday.warmup: 500m row, 2 rounds: 10 KB swings, 10 push-ups, 10 air squats
tuesday.wod:
"Fight Gone Bad" (modified)
3 rounds, 1 min each, 1 min rest between rounds:
- Cal row
- KB swings @ 53lb
- Box jumps
- KB push press @ 35lb
- Burpees

Score = total reps/cals

wednesday.name: Push-Pull Density
wednesday.warmup: 10 min BikeErg, arm swings, 10 push-ups, 10 KB rows each arm
strength: C. KB Hollow Body Hold: 3x30 sec @ 25lb (held at chest)
wednesday.finisher:
5 RFT:
10 cal row
10 KB swings @ 44lb
10 push-ups

thursday.name: Bike + Bells
thursday.main:
BikeErg: 40 min @ conversational pace
At 10, 20, 30 min mark:
- KB Turkish Get-up: 2 each side @ 35lb
- 10 KB windmills each side @ 25lb
thursday.flow:
KB Flow x4 rounds:
5 swings, 5 cleans, 5 snatches, 5 push press each arm
@ 35lb, no rest between movements

friday.name: Pain Cave
friday.wod:
For Time:
500m row
30 KB swings @ 53lb
20 burpees
500m row
20 KB swings
30 burpees
500m row

monday.name: Deload Strength
monday.finisher:
2 RFT (easy pace):
12 cal bike
10 KB swings @ 35lb
8 box step-ups

tuesday.name: Move Well
tuesday.warmup: 500m easy row, joint circles, 10 each: air squats, push-ups, KB halos
tuesday.wod:
NOT for time - focus on movement quality:
3 rounds:
10 KB thrusters @ 25lb
10 KB swings @ 44lb
10 box jumps (step down)
200m row @ 2:00 pace

Rest as needed between rounds

wednesday.name: Deload Upper
wednesday.finisher:
EMOM 8:
Odd: 8 cal row (moderate)
Even: 8 KB snatches @ 25lb

thursday.name: Easy Aerobic
thursday.main:
BikeErg: 35 min @ easy pace (2:10-2:20)
Every 10 min:
- 10 KB swings @ 35lb
- 10 goblet squats @ 25lb
thursday.flow:
KB Flow x2 rounds (easy):
5 deadlifts, 5 cleans, 5 squats, 5 press each arm
@ 25lb

friday.name: Fun Friday
friday.wod:
Partner with yourself - alternate:
10 rounds total:
Round 1: 200m row
Round 2: 15 cal bike
Round 3: 10 KB swings + 10 burpees
(Repeat pattern)

Go at 80% effort, enjoy it
friday.cooldown: 10 min easy bike, celebrate the week

notes.progression: After completing 4-week cycle, increase KB weights by 5-10lb on main lifts
notes.scaling: If weight feels too heavy, drop 10lb. If too easy, add 10lb.
notes.waterTransition: Week of March 1: Replace 2 bike sessions with on-water if possible
